HomeCommandConfiguration.DisabledMsg: I'm sorry {0}, but the home command has been disabled.
HomeCommandConfiguration.NoBedMsg: Opps {0}, looks like you don't have a bed.
HomeCommandConfiguration.NoVehicleMsg: I'm sorry {0}, but you can't be teleported while inside a vehicle.
HomeCommandConfiguration.TeleportMsg: You were sent back to your bed.
HomeCommandConfiguration.FoundBedNowWaitMsg: I have located your bed {0}, please wait for {1} seconds to be teleported.
HomeCommandConfiguration.FoundBedWaitNoMoveMsg: I have located your bed {0}, now don't move for {1} seconds while I prepare you for teleport.
HomeCommandConfiguration.UnableMoveSinceMoveMsg: I'm sorry {0}, but you moved. I am unable to teleport you.
HomeCommandConfiguration.NoTeleportDiedMsg: Sorry {0}, unable to finish home teleport as you died.
